instructions: On your mobile device, open the Google Photos app . Sign in to your Google Account. Select a photo, album, or video. Tap Share . Under "Send in Google Photos," select people to share with. To share with one person, tap their name. To find someone specific, tap Search . Enter their name, phone number, or email address. To share with more than one person, select multiple people. (Optional) Add a message to go with your shared media. To share, tap Send . This will create an ongoing conversation thread where you and the people you have shared with can add additional photos, videos, comments, and likes over time.
